Title: Three Lost Loves
Plot: Davina's quest for self-realisation brings her under the influence of Sue Shortstop, an ardent feminist and scourge of male panellists on discussion shows. As Davina gets in touch with her inner goddess, Shortstop?s husband Ed appears intent on establishing a more tactile connection with one of his attractive students.
ParentalRatingReason: M Drug use, offensive language and nudity
